game.name: Bow Man
game.shortDescription: 활 남자는 정확하게 정밀도와 전략을 사용하여 대상 또는 상대에 화살표를 촬영해야하는 아케이드 게임이다. 촬영 마스터가 될 결투 또는 전체 대상에서 원수와 경쟁.
game.shortDescriptionEn: All you have to do is kill the monsters. Try to kill as many monsters as possible to make the highest score possible.

reviewHighlights.text: Good game, sadly not enough powerups. Would also love to see wave attacks instead of just full blast. But no cap for that money, fully legit game.
The Steam Store images and video are a total lie. There is no score counter, there is no wave counter (at least, it's not explicitly shown) and there...
